response.job_title: Project Manager | Salesforce | SCRUM | MBA |  MBIT | General Division of Information Management en Banco de la República| Profesor Universitario PUJ| Knowledege Management
response.summary:
I am a System's Engineer with an MBA from the Universidad Nacional de Colombia, and an MBIT from the Universidad de los Andes. My experience comprises technology management and customer service projects in-state companies, higher education institutions, and The Central Bank of Colombia.

Currently, I'm the project manager of the new SAC Citizen's Service System of Colombia's Central Bank on Salesforce. Its goal is implementing an integrated solution to allow efficient management of relationships between different stakeholders and the Bank. My main responsibilities are to guarantee legal compliance, to allow interaction of the technological tools and channels which support this relationship and fulfilling requirements between the different Central Bank areas.

Furthermore, I'm proud to be a University Professor on subject matters like Knowledge Management and Innovation for Business Administration, Industrial Engineering, and Social Communication at the Pontificia Universidad Javeriana. I have also taught Management Gaming, Business Administration, Formulation and Evaluation of Marketing Projects at the Universidad Piloto de Colombia.

I have leadership skills to work with multidisciplinary teams to implement high-impact projects. I consider myself a results-oriented person, searching for new challenges and learning, skilled in assertive communication, flexible thinking, creativity, innovation, and persuasion to develop high-performance teams. I am willing to listen to new alternatives for problem-solving and to create spaces for collective construction.

Plus, I'm outgoing and very amical, love to have chattings. Happy to meet you one day.
response.skills: Presentaciones, Analítica de datos, Requisitos del usuario, Preparación de casos empresariales, Elaboración de presupuestos, Especificaciones funcionales, Salesforce Service Cloud, Project Management, Knowledge Management, Gestión de proyectos, Planificación estratégica, Marketing Strategy, Investigación y desarrollo, Branding & Identity, Strategic Planning, Business Strategy, Research, Espíritu empresarial, Estrategia empresarial, Gestión del conocimiento

profile_positions.description: Since 2017 I have been in charge of the development and implementation of the new SAC Citizen's Service System of Colombia's Central Bank.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - Salesforce -  General Division of Information Management

profile_positions.description:
I was the leader of the Technological conceptualization of the SAC Citizen's Service System of Colombia's Central Bank.
The project aimed to satisfy the institution needs to implement policies, processes and technological tools, strengthen its relationships between its different areas and stakeholders, and contribute to the consolidation of the Bank's Citizen Service System.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - Communication and Economic Education Department

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for the implementation of the prototype of the Citizen's Service System of Colombia's Central Bank, carrying out its first deployment nationwide, this implementation included: compliance with legal requirements, policies design, strategies and procedures, development of technological tools, and lead the collaborator's team within all the levels of the process.
profile_positions.title: Specialized Professional - Communication and Economic Education Department

profile_positions.description:
Currently, I teach Knowledge Management at the Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences: 
My objective for the class has been to promote an academic space in which students test and implement different methodologies to identify business opportunities discussing how to generate sustainable value for the Colombian society.
profile_positions.title: University professor

profile_positions.description:
I have been Professor of the Market's Engineering and the Public Accounting and Economics programs. I taught the classes of:
- Management Gaming
- Business Administration
- Formulation and Evaluation of Marketing Projects
- Formulation and Evaluation of Projects
profile_positions.title: University professor

profile_positions.description: As a system engineer, I was in charge to lead the planning and design of the Information System for the Professor´s Competition at the Universidad Nacional de Colombia. The system had to support the selection process of candidates to suit academic roles the University specif requirements. I was responsible for the design of the system and the coordination of the development team. Later on, I worked as an internal auditor of the institution system for continuous improvement across the country.
profile_positions.title: Information Technology System Manager

profile_positions.description:
I structured, managed and developed two projects: The first, focused in the education sector, had the objective was to offer integral solutions to the learning process, it aimed to work with tools of the ICT Information and Communication Technologies to reach users with different needs. 

The second project aimed to build online communities, it focused on connecting people according to their interest areas such as health care, environment, technology, personal development, and encouraged SMEs to grow using e-commerce platforms.
profile_positions.title: IT Professional

education.degree_name: Diploma in digital transformation and industry 4.0

company.name: Banco de la República - Colombia
company.description: Nuestro objetivo principal es preservar la capacidad de compra de nuestro dinero, manteniendo la inflación baja y estable, y de esta forma contribuir para que la economía produzca al máximo nivel de sus capacidades. Asimismo, promover la adecuada gestión del patrimonio cultural de la Nación.
